    THE NATIONAL CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY

    A World-class leader in the regulation and promotion of Aviation

    OUR INTERNATIONAL PARTNERS

    Below are some of our international partners. For further information about them, please click on the link to be directed to their websites.

  • AFCAC (African Civil Aviation Commission)
  • FAA (Federal Aviation Administration)
  • ICAO (International Civil Aviation Organization)
  • IATA (International Air Transport Association)
  • TSA (Transportation Security Administration)
  • RFIR (Roberta Flight Information Region)
  • BAGASOO

    • PRINT PDF Email
    The NCAA is the regulating body of Civil Aviation of Nigeria
